title: Ola Electric S1 range prices slashed by Rs 25,000. Check prices here
description: Ola Electric has reduced the prices of its S1 scooter range by Rs 25,000, effective only in February. The S1 X+, S1 Air, and S1 Pro models have been reduced from Rs 1.09 lakh to Rs 84,999, Rs 1.19 lakh to Rs 1.05 lakh, and Rs 1.48 lakh to Rs 1.30 lakh respectively
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
